alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 27 at 11:18PM EST until February 28 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. The strongest winds are most likely above 2,500 feet. * WHERE...In Virginia, Highland County, and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Pendleton and Eastern Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Western Highland
